author: Winterbay, Rinn
name: autoBasement
longDesc:
Automates Fernswarthy's Basement:
  • Creates and switches oufits
  • Uses cheapest buffs needed for necessary buffing
  • User perference to use Dr. Lucifer or other food/drink/spleen items.
See thread for full list of options.

author: bumcheekcity, Winterbay
name: Bumcheekcend
longDesc:
This is a semi-automated hardcore ascension script. Its stated intent is to:
  1. Ascend Moxie characters through HCNP ascensions to get karma
  2. Ascend Muscle and Myst characters mostly, so you can finish off ascensions started with them
This is not intended for softcore, Bad Moon or any challenge path. If it works... fine, but bugs with will probably remain bugs.

author: bumcheekcity
name: BumPork
longDesc: Simply complete the quest and unlock the Elvish Paradise, run bumpork.ash and it should work fine.

author: Bale
name: CounterChecker
longDesc:
This script will automatically handle all your counters automatically. Supported Counters:
  • Fortune Cookie: If you're not in hardcore it will get the available semi-rare with highest mall price.
  • Wormwood: Will automatically get the wormwood goal of your choice.
    You can set the goal in CLI with: set wormwood = goal
  • Dance Card: Will adventure in Ballroom, if you're not already there and use another dance card.

author: Ioeth, Banana Lord
name: Harvest
shortDesc: A highly customizable KoL farming script
longDesc: Can be configured to the farm whatever you like best. It runs from login to logout, handling all your daily activities (eg: buffbot buffs, prismatic wads, equipping optimal rollover gear etc.). It even hunts bounties.

author: Winterbay, dj_d
name: Make Meat Fast
shortDesc: Automates item farming based on current mall values
longDesc: It surveys the entire kingdom and all of your possessions to figure out what will make you the most meat. If something gets in demand - like briefcases did during one Crimbo - it automatically figures it out and farms accordingly. If farming the castle is best; great - it optimizes you for that as well.

author: slyz
name: Nemesis.ash
longDesc: This script will automatically do the LEW and nemesis Cave quests, farm until you get the volcano map, unlock the volcano island, unlock the nemesis lair and try to solve the volcano maze. Surviving combats is your responsibility.

author: wrldwzrd89
name: PandamoniumQuest
shortDesc: Automates the Steel Organ quest in Pandamonium
longDesc: This will find the various items needed to complete the quest in Pandamonium, solve the puzzles (perhaps changing your gear to maximize success), and finish with a steel organ item.

author: guyy
name: Pork to the Future
shortDesc: Automates the agua de vida quests
longDesc:
A script to automatically complete:
  1. Primordial Fear (be Cyrus's punching bag)
  2. Hyboria (Krakrox does manly things), including Hunt the Wumpus
  3. Future (collect elemental essences)
...and get you a nifty Secret from the Future.

author: Theraze
name: The Sea
longDesc: Automates all underwater quests

author: Alhifar
name: Slime Tube
longDesc: Automates the Slime Tube

author: guyy
name: TrickTreat
longDesc: Automates Halloween Trick or Treating. It will allow you to choose separate outfits for combat and non-combat encounters. If you encounter All-Hallow's Steve, it will abort so you can fight him yourself.

author: Rinn
name: acquireBuff
shortDesc: Get a buff from a buffbot
longDesc: This script will attempt to get you a buff from a buffbot without needing to know the price or even the bot's name.

author: rlbond86
name: Auto Mushroom
shortDesc: Automatically farms mushrooms from Degrassi Knoll
longDesc: Automatically farms mushrooms to produce 8 gloomy black mushrooms every 16 days, along with a lot of additional second and third generation mushrooms.

author: guyy
name: DreadDrunk
shortDesc: Gives booze to the Dreadsylvania Carriageman
longDesc: This will find the most cost-efficient booze (given a non-insane number of mall searches) for making the Carriageman drunk as a Dreadsylvanian skunk, buy as much as it needs, and dump it down his throat.

author: Theraze, dj_d
name: EatDrink
longDesc: Optimize your daily diet

author: Theraze & kitsunenine
name: Get Skill
longDesc: CLI accessible skill acquisition

author: fronobulax
name: Manage Store
shortDesc: Autosell or kBay items in your store that don't sell
longDesc: Autosell or kBay items in your store that don't sell

author: Bale
name: OCD Inventory Control
longDesc: Complete inventory control system

author: Winterbay
name: Sushi
longDesc: Eats best sushi for profit

author: Bale
name: Adventure Advisor
longDesc: Advice about adventure locations

author: Theraze, zarqon
name: CanAdv
shortDesc: Check if you 'Can Adventure' at a location
longDesc: Check whether you can adventure at any given location

author: fronobulax
name: CFStat
shortDesc: Acquire price and sales volume from Coldfront
longDesc: Fetches and caches price and sales volume from Coldfront

author: fronobulax
name: DCQuest
shortDesc: Assists completionists in managing their display case
longDesc: Assists completionists in managing their display case

author: bumcheekcity
name: Easy Snapshot Maker
shortDesc: Take a snapshot of your character to display
longDesc: Take a snapshot of your character to display

author: Ezandora
name: Guide
longDesc: Complete Ascension Guide

author: Turing
name: Missing Manuel
longDesc: Identifies the monsters that you still need Manuel factoids for

author: zarqon
name: Psychose-a-Matic
longDesc: One-stop psychoanalytic jar management

author: rlbond86
name: Relay Task List
longDesc: The ultimate "To Do" list!

author: Almighty Sapling
name: Skill Planner/CS Tracker
shortDesc: Relay script detailing the characters skills and CS
longDesc: Relay script detailing the characters skills and CS

author: rlbond86
name: Superhuman Cocktailcrafting maximizer
shortDesc: Calculates which drinks to superhumanly cocktailcraft
longDesc: Calculates which drinks to superhumanly cocktailcraft

author: lostcalpolydude
name: Tower Checker
longDesc: Shows which items you still need for the Naughty Sorceress' Tower

author: rlbond86
name: Bounty Hunter Helper
longDesc: Shows average number of turns to complete available bounties

author: guyy
name: buttonFrenzy
longDesc: Improves buttons for all stores

author: Bale, Chez
name: CHIT
longDesc: This skins your left pane to make everything easier to see at the same time. It adds a lot of great tools like an outfit switcher and Florist Plant control. It is also so beautifully shiny that your entire life will be better.

author: Heeheehee, Theraze, Rinn
name: Charsheet: Skills by Class
shortDesc: Groups skills by class on the charsheet
longDesc: Groups skills by class on the charsheet

author: bordemstirs
name: Clan Raidlog Parser
longDesc: Makes your clan dungeons like Hobopolis and Dreadsylvania a lot more friendly. It is the KoLmafia version of Dr.Evi1's famous greasemonkey script.

author: rlbond86, ckb
name: Enhanced Inventory Spoilers
longDesc: Shows item effects/enchantments in inventory

author: rlbond86
name: Fax Identification
shortDesc: Tells you what you got from the fax machine
longDesc: Tells you what you got from the fax machine

author: rlbond86
name: Improved Guild Trainer
shortDesc: Shows skill descriptions for all these newfangled skills
longDesc: Shows skill descriptions for all these newfangled skills

author: rlbond86
name: Modular Choice Override
longDesc: Allows overriding of choice adventures

author: Bale
name: Monster Manuel: Improved
shortDesc: Lets big monsters be big in KoL's Monster Manuel
longDesc: Lets big monsters be big in KoL's Monster Manuel. It also adds annotations for ambiguous monsters such as which ornate bedstand is which and the version of the El Vibrato monsters that you get from the translator.

author: Bale
name: Manor Informer
shortDesc: Get full status on Manor unlocking from ground floor
longDesc: Get full status on Manor unlocking from ground floor

author: guyy
name: TrophyTastic
longDesc: The trophy case de-suckifier

author: Bale
name: Woods quest starter
longDesc: Get the continuum transfunctioner and screwdriver when woods are first visited

author: zarqon
name: BatMan RE
shortDesc: Provides advanced combat interface in browser
longDesc: Provides advanced combat HUD and automation in the relay browser.

author: zarqon
name: SmartStasis
shortDesc: Automates stasis and other non-lethal combat
longDesc: Automates stasis and all other times you don't kill a monster such as insulting pirates and flyering.

author: Winterbay
name: WHAM
longDesc: This is a custom combat script.  It kills all the things.

author: zarqon
name: BatBrain
shortDesc: A central nervous system for consult scripts
longDesc: A central nervous system for consult scripts. This library script will not work by itself.

author: zarqon
name: CLI Links
shortDesc: Adds CLI commands to relay scripts
longDesc: Adds CLI commands to relay scripts. This library script will not work by itself.

author: jasonharper
name: Form of...HTML!
shortDesc: Code library to add input forms for relay scripts
longDesc: Code library to add input forms for relay scripts. This library script will not work by itself.

author: zarqon
name: ZLib
shortDesc: Zarqon's general function library for scripters
longDesc: Zarqon's general function library for scripters. This library script will not work by itself.

author: zarqon
name: BestBetweenBattle
shortDesc: Manages gazoodles of between battle stuff
longDesc: Manages gazoodles of between battle stuff. That includes choice adventure default options, turtle taming, switching item drop familiars and much more.

author: guyy
name: LootBot
longDesc: Sell dungeon loot, lazily

author: Bale
name: New Life
shortDesc: Scripting the birth of a new ascension
longDesc: Scripting the birth of a new ascension. This sets optimal choice adventure defaults for your class and ascension path. It also does a few repetitive housekeeping chores such as visiting the Toot Oriole, opening your pork sack, using your Newbie Tent, equipping starting gear...
